Issue.creator: skarim
Issue.summary: TLS on client fails if TLS certificate issued by BCCSP
Issue.description: Loading TLS certificate and key pair fails on the client side if certificate was issued by BCCSP. The key look up logic is missing from fabric-ca/lib/tls/tls.go in the GetClientTLSConfig() function. A similar change as made in https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/9235/ for server TLS configuration is needed for fabric-ca client TLS as well.
